squidpony.squidgrid.fov

Interface ThinWallFOVSolver

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FOVSolver

    @Beta
public interface ThinWallFOVSolver
extends FOVSolver
    Interface for FOVSolvers which can work with thin walls. Thin walls are walls which are between grid cells, signified by indicating a wall on the edge of a cell.
    Author:
    Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface squidpony.squidgrid.fov.FOVSolver

        calculateFOV, calculateFOV
